## Contract and Tender Description

This Standing Offer includes all necessary services for an undefined period for: inspection, repair and maintenance of HVAC equipment. bidder will also provide necessary tools, transportation and supervision for the same tasks.

## Contract and Tender Description

The Standing Offer includes all necessary services for an undefined period for:

- Inspection, repair, and maintenance of HVAC equipment
- Provision of all necessary tools, transportation, and supervision for these tasks
- Work tasks to be conducted at CFB Suffield and other premises within the Ralston village

The selected offeror will be awarded a two (2) year contract
